original_text: The people from Beeroth had run away to Gittaim. So Beeroth's people still live there as strangers.
korean_text: 일찍이 브에롯 사람들이 깃다임으로 도망하여 오늘까지 거기에 우거함이더라

sentences.original_text: The people from Beeroth had run away
So Beeroth's people still live there
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 베로옷 사람들은 아직도 거기에 살고 있다
